verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the days <WH3117> of Ahasuerus <WH325>, (this is Ahasuerus <WH325> which reigned <WH4427>, from India <WH1912> even unto Ethiopia <WH3568>, over an hundred <WH3967> and seven <WH7651> and twenty <WH6242> provinces <WH4082>:)

And Memucan <WH4462> answered <WH559> before <WH6440> the king <WH4428> and the princes <WH8269>, Vashti <WH2060> the queen <WH4436> hath not done wrong <WH5753> to the king <WH4428> only, but also to all the princes <WH8269>, and to all the people <WH5971> that are in all the provinces <WH4082> of the king <WH4428> Ahasuerus <WH325>.

For this deed <WH1697> of the queen <WH4436> shall come abroad <WH3318> unto all women <WH802>, so that they shall despise <WH959> their husbands <WH1167> in their eyes <WH5869>, when it shall be reported <WH559>, The king <WH4428> Ahasuerus <WH325> commanded <WH559> Vashti <WH2060> the queen <WH4436> to be brought in <WH935> before <WH6440> him, but she came <WH935> not.

If it please <WH2895> the king <WH4428>, let there go <WH3318> a royal <WH4438> commandment <WH1697> from him <WH6440>, and let it be written <WH3789> among the laws <WH1881> of the Persians <WH6539> and the Medes <WH4074>, that it be not altered <WH5674>, That Vashti <WH2060> come <WH935> no more before <WH6440> king <WH4428> Ahasuerus <WH325>; and let the king <WH4428> give <WH5414> her royal estate <WH4438> unto another <WH7468> that is better <WH2896> than she. And when the king's <WH4428> decree <WH6599> which he shall make <WH6213> shall be published <WH8085> throughout all his empire <WH4438>, (for it is great <WH7227>,) all the wives <WH802> shall give <WH5414> to their husbands <WH1167> honour <WH3366>, both to great <WH1419> and small <WH6996>.

For he sent <WH7971> letters <WH5612> into all the king's <WH4428> provinces <WH4082>, into every province <WH4082> according to the writing <WH3791> thereof, and to every people <WH5971> after their language <WH3956>, that every man <WH376> should bear rule <WH8323> in his own house <WH1004>, and that it should be published <WH1696> according to the language <WH3956> of every people <WH5971>. that it: Heb. that one should publish it according to the language of his people
